These are all lists of things, but of what? The underpants or dragon lists might be the easiest to figure out.
The lists are all lists of children's books, but they might not be ordered the way you expect them to.
The lists all share a common theme.
Only one of the emoji-fied letters in each list is used for extraction.
The question marks at the bottom suggest that you need to make a new list. Which books should you choose and how should you order them?
